```{python}
import pandas as pd
```

```{python}
sheet_name = "1keyg5g2LvQZOsFTb-uurTDQJY65g5vRgp-lzhOMllNQ"
sheet_id = "Key_Legal_Terms"
```

```{python}
url = f"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/{sheet_name}/gviz/tq?tqx=out:csv&sheet={sheet_id}"
terms_df = pd.read_csv(url)
```

```{python}
results = []
terms = terms_df['Term'].tolist()
for term in terms:
    results.append({'term': str(term)})
ojs_define(data = results)
```

```{ojs}
viewof policy_trm_search = Inputs.search(data, 
{placeholder: "Enter a Policy Term", 
width: 1500,
label: "Search Policy Terms"
})

viewof pol_terms_rows = Inputs.table(policy_trm_search, {
  columns: [
    'term',
  ],
  format: {
    'term': x => htl.html`<button type="button" class="leas btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary">${x}</button>`,
  },
  width: { 
    term: 900,
  },
})
```
